body.name: Yaheetech Queen Solid Pine Wood Platform Bed Frame - Reserved Holes for Headboard, Wooden Slats Support, 7.5" Clearance, No Noise, Easy Assembly - Smoked Walnut
features: 【Natural Solid Wood for Better Durability】100% Solid natural pine platform bed frame with 28 wooden slats and 7 reinforced wood legs provides excellent durability and stability with a high weight capacity of 838 lb. Queen size platform bed is 1.5″ L × 62″ W × 13.5 ″H.

【Experience Worry-Free Sleep】Our wooden bed frame is crafted with extra sturdy hardwoods, without fragile slats that bend, break, or offer poor support. Rest easy and indulge in the long-lasting quality of our premium materials for worry-free sleep.

【Pre-drilling for Personalized Headboard】For ease of use our wooden bed frame comes with pre-drilled holes, making installing your customizable headboard easy, enjoying two different sleeping experiences.

【Easy-to-Lock Connectors】Our gray easy-lock connectors come pre-assembled, providing added hooks and screws for enhanced stability and safety. This ensures that the parts of the wood bed frame remain securely in place even during moving, preventing any risk of them easily falling off.

【Considerate Details】The bed frame is thoughtfully designed with wooden slats that are connected with cloth strips, making installation a breeze. This beautiful bed frame is available in multiple sizes, including twin, double, and queen, catering to your specific needs and preferences.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With a sleek silhouette and low-set platform, our beds are reminiscent of cool, mid-century modern design, embracing natural beauty and providing ultra-comfort. Built with 100% natural pine wood, this wooden platform bed boasts solid wood construction and heavy-duty legs for ultimate support and durability. Engineered with wooden slats for mattress support, eliminating the need for a box spring. Thoughtfully designed with 7 inches of clearance space under the bed, allowing cleaning robots to pass through effortlessly, making cleaning a breeze. Moreover, the bed is designed with ease of assembly in mind, minimizing any hardship during installation for a quick and straightforward setup. With a distinctive look and feel, the minimalist design seamlessly integrates into any home décor style, harmonizing with its surroundings and complementing existing pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice and sturdy for the money
reviews.reviewText: Saw this on sale for 90 for black friday and glad I got it ! Its very sturdy with actual pine boards for the supports, easy to put together and doesnt require a drill at all because of the soft pine used. Was able to attach my existing headboard to it as well without too much effort. The finish is that fake wood vinyl, but it looks really nice and you really cant tell once a bed is on it, and even then they bothered to wrap the rounded edges of it so its a nice looking piece. Totally silent. Considering how cheap this was + free shipping with prime, its a great value and seems like it will hold up for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, pretty, sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: Not bad assembly. I like the wood color, sturdy. No wobble, so sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value. Surprisingly sturdy and quick to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: This simple and attractive solid pine bed was easy to assemble, especially fast with a motorized screwdriver if you have one. Just be sure to not over-tighten and strip anything! Also be sure to use the large number of screws required for the slats. They add significant and important stability overall. This bed frame should last a very long while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bed frame broke after 4 nights
reviews.reviewText: Everything about the bed frame was great. Up until the 4th night that I was using it rolled out of bed and the frame broke. Don't buy it. It looks nice. And it felt sturdy during construction, but four nights is not exactly your money's worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good bed frame
reviews.reviewText: it took me forever to find a bed frame that I liked and I'm happy with this one. it was very easy to assemble. it's a nice color and it does not make any creaking noises while you're on it. the only kind of issues I have with it aren't issues really, it's just more of a slight inconvenience. the wooden pieces that keep that mattress up, they are close to the top of the frame. this means that the mattress doesn't have much of a border to stop it from easily sliding off. also, I got a full sized frame, and it is slightly bigger than my mattress. so you can still see the wood beneath the mattress and it looks kind of odd. but overall it's good, it does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars classic design but nice quality
reviews.reviewText: Like the classic design, nothing sticks out to bump into or protrude. Only issue I had with my order was one of the four legs did not have all the holes drilled into it, so I couldn't put it together. I did notify the company, but went ahead and drilled the holes myself matching it up with the other legs so I didn't have to wait for a replacement. Because I needed a bed! Didn't want to sleep on the floor waiting for a new leg to arrive. Other than that, it was simple to put together and appears to be sturdy. I would prefer to have a metal center support. But overall it has worked fine since I put it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality wood, easy setup, and solid structure
reviews.reviewText: Very sound structure with good material quality. A lot of screws holding everything together, wood is solid for every parts and don’t have strong order. A hand drill can came handy during assembly, I’m using ratchet screwdriver takes some time and energy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid wood, beautiful color.
reviews.reviewText: I love this bed. I needed a full bed with headboard to fit under a window. Couldn’t find one. So I purchased this bed and paired it with this headboard, Atlantic Furniture R-181834 Headboard, Full, Walnut. Almost perfect match. You need to drill to attach the headboard, fyi. But they line up beautifully. The bed is modern but warm, solid, I paired it with 14 inch memory foam mattress. You do not feel like you are sitting any lower than a standard box spring and mattress. The side tables are 26.5 inches high for comparison. There are center legs for support, but no side center legs to take out your toes in a small room. I can’t capture the wood color in a photo, it is a very neutral walnut brown with a TINY auburn. This is not cherry, nor mahogany colored. I thought it was easy to put together, straight side of legs to the outside. For the price, I could not have done better!
